meanings.definition: A rigid metallic conductor that serves as a common connection for electrical circuits.
meanings.sent1: The busbars in the power plant efficiently distribute electricity.
meanings.sent2: Electricians use busbars to connect different circuits in a building.
meanings.sent3: The busbars at the party were the perfect way to connect all the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like busbars, connecting people with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The busbars hummed with energy, lighting up the entire room.

meanings.definition: A strip or bar of copper or aluminum used to conduct electricity within a power distribution system.
meanings.sent1: The busbars in the factory efficiently carry electricity to all machines.
meanings.sent2: The busbars in the circuit breaker help regulate the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The busbars at the picnic were a shocking way to power the grill.
meanings.sent4: His words were like busbars, conducting power through the audience.
meanings.sent5: The busbars gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their vital role in the system.
